adverbs.description: pinkly (comparative more pinkly, superlative most pinkly)

entries.meaning: In a pink manner; with pink colour.
examples: Stanley had been with me for only a few weeks when he vacuumed up his food even faster than normal, came back into the living room, tottered, and keeled over, eyes closed, the tip of his tongue protruding pinkly through his teeth.
